post.author: 김세환
post.content:
If you are qualified, pls contact me at 'kimsw2003@hotmail.com'.

1.We need someone with mainframe background (Cobol, VSAM, DB2) as well as recent web-based experience (HTML, ASP, VB, JavaScript).

2. Excellent communication required.

Thanks.
post.title: A contract position.
